h2_title: Where to Find the Tiger's Acolyte
h3_title: Tiger’s Acolyte Mini-Boss Fight and Guide
content: If possible, you can try to go Rock Solid when he jabs, otherwise he’ll quickly pull backwards and retreat before you can try to retaliate — which often leads to one if his leaping attacks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Tiger's_Acolyte.md', within the main section titled 'Tiger's Acolyte', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Tiger's Acolyte' and the sub-subsection 'Tiger’s Acolyte Mini-Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
If possible, you can try to go Rock Solid when he jabs, otherwise he’ll quickly pull backwards and retreat before you can try to retaliate — which often leads to one if his leaping attacks.
